The online version of its Dynamics CRM Software will be now available in 40 countries and in 41 languages at a promotional offer of$ 34 per user per month for 12 months. 4 minutes ago By DEE-ANN DURBIN, AP Auto Writer Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.
